Regulation Name(s): Integrated Continuous Glucose Monitoring System, Factory Calibrated, Not For Use With Automated Insulin Delivery Systems
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Abbott FreeStyle Libre 2 Flash Glucose Monitoring sensor
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Bigfoot Unity Diabetes Management System integrating continuous glucose monitoring and insulin dosing recommendations for diabetes management
Indications for Use Summary: Indicated for management of diabetes in persons age 12 years and older, providing glucose data via Abbott FreeStyle Libre 2 sensor, assisting with insulin dosing for users of disposable pen-injectors, for single patient use and requiring a prescription
